title: Bacon, lentil and tomato soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '200g back bacon, cut into bite size pieces', '1 onion, chopped', '1 to 2 large potatoes, chopped in small cubes', '2 sticks celery, finely chopped', '1 to 2 large carrots, diced', '2 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 teaspoon finely grated root ginger', '6 tomatoes, chopped', '130g dried red lentils', '900ml vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 small handful fresh coriander, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
